metadata.synopsis: One-liner AD given by the narrator describing the inscription on a plaque next to one of the portals in Sorcerous Sundries. In this one a false statement is said about the nightsong is given to mark this portal as a wrong one to go through in the Sorcerous Sundries portal puzzle.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Interact with the plaque next to the green portal in CTY_Main, 5; 30; -95

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *The Nightsong is an ancient potion that allows its drinker to become irresistably attractive to man and god alike.*
